value.heading: Sendit Terms And Conditions
value.description:
By using Sendit, you agree to the terms and conditions listed on this page.

Sendit may change the terms on this page. We will take steps to notify you when this occurs, but you are responsible for staying up-to-date with these changes.

title_suffix.comment: Added at the end of the title and highlighted in a different color

logo_url.comment: Link for the logo in the top left of the footer

copyright.comment: Automatically prefixed with the current year

page_description.comment: If empty, defaults to the description set in the Site SEO data file

favicon_icon.comment: For the shortcut icon meta tag

canonical_url.comment: If empty, defaults to the page URL

featured_image.comment: Defaults to the image set in the Site SEO data file

author_twitter_handle.comment: Defaults to the twitter site value set in the Site SEO data file

no_index.comment: When selected this removes the page from your sitemap and adds the noindex robots meta tag

permalink.comment: Prefix the url with a forward slash e.g. /blog/

FAQ.title: Is there a maximum numbers of emails I can send each month?
FAQ.description: No, the prices include unlimited emails. Send to your heart's content.

FAQ.title: Where can I find out more information?
FAQ.description: Right here on this website, or contact our support team.

FAQ.title: Do you have pricing for non-profits?
FAQ.description: Yes, contact our support team and we'll get you set up on our non-profit plan.

FAQ.title: What forms of payment do you accept?
FAQ.description: We accept credit cards, checks, and cash.
